hero.title: Welcome to PAPERBEE BOOKS
hero.subtitle: Magical Stories for Children Worldwide
hero.description: Discover our collection of multilingual children's books, educational materials, and enchanting stories that inspire young minds across cultures.

about.title: About PAPERBEE BOOKS
about.description: We are a passionate children's book publishing company dedicated to creating magical stories and educational content for young readers around the world.
about.mission: Our mission is to bridge cultures through storytelling, offering books in multiple languages including English, Arabic, Japanese, Indonesian, Hindi, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil, and Urdu.
about.vision: We believe every child deserves access to quality literature in their native language.

footer.tagline: Inspiring young minds through multilingual storytelling
